title: Qute: a Template Engine for Quarkus applications
content: Qute is a templating engine designed specifically for Quarkus. You can use this template engine in a variety of projects but the most common use case is to provide a View to JAX-RS Resouces. There are mainly two options to use Qute with JAX-RS: Injecting the Template name in your JAX-RS Endpoint: This is the ...  The post appeared first on .
